entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `fixed` buffer index access false type with semantic model analysis #63993
  • Breaking change around contextual keyword `scoped` #63986
  • Desktop ErrorsDuringMethodBodyEditing is flaky #63982
  • NetCore.ErrorsDuringMethodBodyEditing is flaky #63981
  • Problem with "potential fix" suggestions being not displayed #63974
    17.4
  • Deprecate `Microsoft.Net.Compilers` on NuGet #63973
  • 'Frozen Partial' semantics need to be reconciled with OOP and SourceGEnerators #63968

Closed

  • Add an overload of `CSharpSyntaxTree.Create` that allows to specify checksum algorithm #62923
    C# 12.0
  • PdbWriter.SerializeDebugInfo() drops extern aliases if the first method is a synthesized method #63927
    17.4
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-32912.209 #63967

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1992025 #63994
  • Change the container of Inheritance margin #63992
    Area-IDE
  • Semantic snippets - Turn on experiment + turn off old snippets while new snippet experience is on #63991
    Area-IDE
  • Add theming service and VS implementation #63990
    Area-IDE
  • Simplify deserialization of SerializableSourceTexts #63989
    Area-IDE
  • Require diagnostics to have a location and for that location to have a filepath. #63988
    Area-IDE
  • Add `MatchPriority.Deprioritize` and tweak item selection #63985
    Area-IDE
  • Don't request frozen partial document for semantic tokens in proc #63984
    Area-IDE
  • Cache results of reading SOurceText in SerializableSourceText #63980
    Area-IDE
  • Remove roslyn Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Common patch #63978
    Area-Compilers
  • Update Csc.cs #63976
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Report CS0721 on parameter type #63975
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Skip a flaky test #63983
    Area-IDE, Next
  • First Draft of Common Language Server Protocol Framework (CLaSP) #62924
    Area-IDE
  • Semantic snippets - prop snippet #63838
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1987893 #63879
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63987
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Simplify adjustment of spans #63969
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Move 'Todo Comments' to EA pattern (redux) #63902
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63979
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Add feature flag for convert to record #63910
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Records
  • Do not serialize extern aliases to synthesized method #63928
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Add a test #63753
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63972
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Support changing return types of methods, properties, events #63486
    Area-Interactive, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63970
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Remove unused param #63966
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Simplify data model for task list #63963
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63965
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Use ScopedTypeSyntax in LocalDeclarationStatementSyntax #63962
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Merge main to features/CLaSP #63998
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63997
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #63996
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Simplify project cache cleanup #63995
    Area-IDE
  • Semantic snippets - for loop snippet #62990
    Area-IDE
  • Refactor RunTests #63948
    Area-IDE, Area-Infrastructure, Infraswat
  • Emit [module: RefSafetyRules] attribute for all modules compiled with updated escape rules #63916
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Allow adding `scoped` or removing `[UnscopedRef]` for override, interface implementation, or delegate conversion #63656
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Replace Razor Source Generator reference with one loaded from a VSIX #63912
    Area-IDE
  • Deprecate usage of Workspace in TextLoader (breaking change) #63616
    Area-IDE, Needs API Review
  • Use real data type for diagnostic location information #63946
    Area-IDE
  • Convert To Record Refactoring/Code Fix initial offering #63654
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Records
  • Ensure we use the type name in a default expression to prevent conflicts #63964
    Area-IDE
  • Add ChecksumAlgorithm to project snapshot #62840
    Area-IDE, Needs API Review
  • Fix Equals override for CompilerDiagnostic reported by CompilerDiagnosticAnalyzer #63937
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Delegate to base constructor when generating from members #63942
    Area-IDE
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • Remove 'Push' diagnostics option #62735
    Area-IDE
  • Ban api #62921
    Area-IDE
